meanings.definition: A person or animal that gulps.
meanings.sent1: The hungry gulpers quickly finished their meal.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper fed the gulpers at the wildlife sanctuary.
meanings.sent3: The gulpers at the picnic ate so fast they almost forgot to breathe.
meanings.sent4: The gulpers in the race devoured the food like lightning.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gulpers swallowing their food whole was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Plural form of gulper, referring to multiple individuals who gulp.
meanings.sent1: The gulpers in the pond were all hungry for fish.
meanings.sent2: The group of gulpers gathered by the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The gulpers at the party drank their juice in one big gulp.
meanings.sent4: The gulpers in the contest were like a whirlwind of eating.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the gulpers feeding together was quite a spectacle.

meanings.definition: A device or machine used for gulping or swallowing quickly.
meanings.sent1: The automatic food gulper dispensed treats for the pets.
meanings.sent2: The gulpers in the factory helped speed up production.
meanings.sent3: The gulpers in the kitchen made cooking a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The machine acted like a gulpers' assistant, swallowing items in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the gulpers at work was like music to the ears.
